data.title: Tenders and Procurement Profile
data.meta_description: View Darlington Borough Council tenders, recent contract awards, top suppliers, procurement profile, spend profile and procurement frameworks.
data.text:
In terms of their procurement profile, Darlington Borough Council is most similar to organisations such as Hartlepool Borough Council, Redcar and Cleveland Borough Council, Middlesbrough Borough Council, Newcastle City Council (Lead Authority), and The Council of the City of Newcastle upon Tyne.

Darlington Borough Council most often put out tenders for Health and social work services (32%), followed by Construction work (11%), and Business services: law, marketing, consulting, recruitment, printing and security (11%).

What do customers think of Tenderlake?

"We were nervous about missing out on key opportunities so ran the service in tandem, over 2 months, with a current market leader in public tender searches and a human basis lead generation service. Tenderlake, in this period, has not missed a single relevant opportunity and has in fact surfaced relevant multimillion pound opportunities the other services missed."
